data.eml:eml: On the Neotropical spider Subfamily Masteriinae (Araneae, Dipluridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Passanha, Victor, Brescovit, Antonio D. (2018): On the Neotropical spider Subfamily Masteriinae (Araneae, Dipluridae). Zootaxa 4463 (1): 1-73, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.1441911
